betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This quest serves the purpose of equipping you with the extra stuff you need for running the §3Implosion Compressor§r. As such, you can complete it by making §cPowderbarrels§r, §cTNT§r, §cDynamite§r, or §cIndustrial TNT§r, listed from least to most complex.
The more complex the explosive, the smaller the amount the §3Implosion Compressor§r needs per recipe, with §cIndustrial TNT§r requiring only§9 1§r, while §cPowderbarrels§r a whopping§9 8§r!
Below are instructions for making "regular" §c§cTNT§r, but you should check out the recipes of the other three before you commit.

§cTNT§r (Trinitrotoluene) can't be prepared with the usual Gunpowder and Sand anymore. Instead, make §aGelled Toluene§r and react it with Sulfuric Acid to make TNT.

The §3HV Chemical Reactor§r§r recipe will double the yield of §aGelled Toluene§r, at cost of additional inputs. Not strictly required.

I do not have any strong tips to give you for §aToluene§r. No matter what you do, it will be painful!
Don't miss out on the direct §aHeavy Fuel§r to §aToluene§r recipe in the single block §3Distillery§r.

§aToluene§r can also optionally be used in the §5EV§r Age to make §dGasoline§r..
